title: failed to update calendar app (upgrade 5.0.7 -> 5.0.8)
body:
while upgrading from 5.0.7 to 5.0.8 i got the following error msg. i didn't have any issues with calendar app so far. how to fix it?

>aktualisiere owncloud auf version 5.0.8. dies kã¶nnte eine weile dauern.

>turned on maintenance mode
>updated database
failed to update calendar app: failed to update database structure (mdb2 error: unknown error, _doquery: [error message: could not execute statement] [last executed query: alter table `oc_calendar_objects` rename to `oc_clndr_objects`, change `id` `id` int unsigned not null auto_increment primary key, change `calendarid` `calendarid` int unsigned default 0 not null, change `startdate` `startdate` datetime default '1970-01-01 00:00:00', change `enddate` `enddate` datetime default '1970-01-01 00:00:00'] [native code: 1068] [native message: multiple primary key defined] )
>
>the update was unsuccessful. please report this issue to the owncloud community.



server configuration:

operating system: ubuntu 12.04
web server: server version: apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu), server built: mar 8 2013 15:53:13
database: mysql
php version: php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6
owncloud version: 5.0.7 (in progress of update to 5.0.8)
